items.title: Design Thinking in 3 Steps
items.headline: Understand your audience, envision a creative solution, and test your prototype
objectives_summary: Apply the design thinking framework to solve problems more creatively
Create prototypes to test your idea early, before making a big investment of time and money
Understand problems from the customer's perspective

items.title: User Experience Design Essentials - Adobe XD UI UX Design

You will be able to start earning money from your XD Skills.
You will be able to add UX designer to your CV

items.title: UX & Web Design Master Course: Strategy, Design, Development

visible_instructors.name: Joe
visible_instructors.title: Joe Natoli
visible_instructors.job_title: 30-year UX + Design Veteran; Consultant, Author & Speaker

items.headline: Learn how to apply User Experience (UX) principles to your website designs, code a variety of sites, and increase sales!
objectives_summary: A clear understanding of the principles and benefits of good UX and how to apply it to your website
A strategy for making sure you know what people need from your website, and what you or your client needs from it in order to succeed
The confidence to know what information should be included in your website, and how to design it to increase conversions

Design mobile and desktop apps

items.headline: This course is for anyone interested in learning the theory of UX design.

You’ll find out how much a UX designer can earn.
You’ll learn how to research a UX project.

items.title: Gamification: Motivation Psychology & The Art of Engagement
items.headline: Learn how to motivate and engage anyone by learning the psychology that underpins human behaviour.
objectives_summary: Understand the psychology of human behaviour
Motivate your students, staff, customers, users and yourself
Build an engagement plan to create change in a community

items.title: User Experience (UX): The Ultimate Guide to Usability and UX

visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David Travis
visible_instructors.job_title: Author of 'Think Like a UX Researcher'

items.headline: Get a job in UX and build your user research and UX design skills with this hands-on user experience training course.
objectives_summary: Bake UX into your workflow by following a proven, user centred design framework.
Plan field visits and user interviews to uncover user needs.
Moderate a usability test and prioritise the observations.

items.title: Master Digital Product Design: UX Research & UI Design
items.headline: A complete design education for product designers: Research the user experience, then design a great user interface
objectives_summary: Critical Thinking
User Interface Design
User Experience Research

items.title: Gamification & Behavioral Design: The Octalysis Framework

visible_instructors.name: Yu-kai
visible_instructors.title: Yu-kai Chou
visible_instructors.job_title: International Keynote Speaker & Author in Gamification

items.headline: Learn the 8 Core Drives that motivate us all (beyond Points, Badges, and Leaderboards)
objectives_summary: Understand how the brain works
How to trigger motivations
Be able to apply behavioral design to all sorts of aspects in their lives, such as fundraising, sales, team motivation, parenting, teaching, relationships, and more.

items.title: Sketching for UX Designers - Boost UX work with pen & paper!
items.headline: Learn how to boost your UX design workflow with sketching user interfaces, animations and storyboarding.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be able to sketch user interfaces, user flows, ui animations and storyboards.
You will understand that you don’t need any artistic skills, sketching is about generating and communicating ideas.
This course is also a great starting point for other areas of visual thinking, like graphic facilitation or sketchnoting.

items.title: UI/UX design with Adobe XD: Design & Prototype a Mobile App
items.headline: Learn how to design a beautiful and engaging mobile app with Adobe Experience Design (XD). Learn-by-doing approach.
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to use Adobe XD to design and prototype a mobile app. The skills acquired can also be used to design websites
You'll be able to apply the design techniques and productivity tips you have learned in your own design workflow
You'll be one step closer to becoming a good UI/UX designer

items.title: Information Architecture (IA) Fundamentals

visible_instructors.title: Joe Natoli
visible_instructors.job_title: 30-year UX + Design Veteran; Consultant, Author & Speaker

items.headline: Everything you need to know — from what content should be presented to what it’s called to how it’s organized!
objectives_summary: Develop an IA that clearly illustrates the depth of content, its organization and priority.
Label and organize content in a way that makes sense to users.
Rules and methods for organizing the content and flow of a website, app or system.
